commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Why must I pretend to be a school idol?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Because according to you, being a school idol is the biggest waste of time ever, right?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: She didn't even blink!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Grr, what's her problem?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Now, now, let's keep our remarks to ourselves and see what our club president does.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I guess we have no choice.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ahaha... Then the shortest path to understanding how we feel is experiencing it for yourself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If you can understand, even a little, why we work so hard as school idols, you might be able to see where the other clubs are coming from as well.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I do not think I will understand your fascination simply by doing it myself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's not constructive to decide that before you even start.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I think wasting time is far less constructive. However, desperate times call for desperate measures, so I will reluctantly follow your plan.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thank you. There's one condition though. Is that all right?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Just go ahead and tell me what it is, already. Although I cannot promise I will go along with it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: In exchange for me helping the student council, I want you to pay close attention to everyone practicing.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: If that is all...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We look forward to working with you. So with that said, let's start practicing for our club introduction live show right away!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: It might be tough since this is your first time, so don't push yourself too hard, okay?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I have committed to doing this, so I will give it one hundred percent.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, before we start, can I say something?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What is it, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Isn't it weird to keep calling her by her last name if we're going to be practicing together?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Do you want to call her something else?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: That might help us get along better.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I came up with the perfect nickname for you!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Sigh* I am fine with whatever you came up with.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It literally means "salty girl" in Japanese, which is perfect for you since you're always so salty... Shioko!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm Rinako and Shizuku is Shizuko, so that matches perfectly.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Call me whatever you please.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We can call you anything? Then I think I'll go with Shio-ti!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Shio-ti? That's certainly a first. I suppose that goes for Shioko as well. Well, whatever.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, okay, let's start practicing! Shioriko, can you watch everyone do the warm-up dance and try to learn it?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Understood.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Pant* *Pant* It is difficult to move my body how I want.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, that was really good for your first time! I'm actually shocked because you danced way better than I expected.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes. Your movements were so lovely that my eyes kept drifting back to you. Do you have dance experience, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: A bit of traditional Japanese dance.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I see!  So that's why you're so graceful. Incredible! I want you to teach me, too.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I don't know enough to teach anyone.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I feel like it wouldn't take much practice before you're ready for a live show.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I don't think so. Someone of my skill level is nowhere near good enough to perform in front of an audience.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Really? I think you're good enough.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I managed to copy the movements, but I wasn't really performing. I could not call myself a school idol.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You're very hard on yourself.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: It is presumptuous of me to even compare myself to them, but this is nothing if you consider how strict top tier school idols are.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: They never allow themselves to give in and always put forth their best effort.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, do you know a lot about school idols, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: My older sister used to be...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? Was your sister a school idol?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: No, she wasn't a school idol, she was like you. She was obsessed with supporting school idols.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? I'd love to talk to her. Hey, do you think...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: E-Excuse me. Um, I can't do this last step correctly. Can someone teach me how to do it?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Leave it to me! You just do this and then do that! Easy-peasy!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Umm...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Come on, Ai, that's not helpful. Um, Shioriko, I think you'll be able to dance that last step smoothly if you think about "Mary Had a Little Lamb."

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: M-Mary Had a Little Lamb?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: That's too abstract. Just play this dance video and take a five-minute nap, and you'll be able to do the dance perfectly by the time you wake up.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Wh-What?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: S-So that's how you've all been learning dances. Wow. Shioriko, that last part uses a box step. But on the third step...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Thank you very much, Ayumu. That was very easy to understand. You are a good teacher.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Laugh* I couldn't dance at all at first. That girl over there is the one who patiently taught me. I'm just telling you exactly what she told me, so she's the real teacher.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: If you have any other questions, feel free to ask me anytime, okay?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I will. Thank you very much.
